_description: Sample FAQ data for AI chatbot context injection
_usage: This file contains frequently asked questions that will help the AI provide accurate answers

faqs.question: How do I get started?
faqs.answer: Simply sign up for an account and follow our onboarding guide.

faqs.question: What payment methods do you accept?
faqs.answer: We accept all major credit cards and PayPal.

faqs.question: Can I cancel my subscription anytime?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time with no cancellation fees.
